Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.model.board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class that manages the game board and gives access to the cells
Author:
Luca Morandini
See Also:

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell​(Point pos)
      Returns a cell on the map
      Parameters:
      pos - coordinates of the cell
      Returns:
      cell with the requested coordinates

    • move

      public void move​(Point oldPoint, Point newPoint)
      Moves the position of a worker on the map
      Parameters:
      oldPoint - current position of the worker
      newPoint - new position of the worker after the move

    • move

      public void move​(Point oldPoint, Point newPoint, Point otherNewPoint)
      Moves the positions of two workers on the map simultaneously
      Parameters:
      oldPoint - current position of the current worker
      newPoint - new position of the current worker / current position of the other worker
      otherNewPoint - new position of the other worker

    • build

      public void build​(Point pos, BuildOption option)
      Increments the level of a tower on the map or builds a dome
      Parameters:
      pos - coordinates of the tower
      option - determines if build a block or a dome

    • getCellsWithBuild

      public java.util.List<Cell> getCellsWithBuild()
